page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Most of the area is{farmed,}and is split between intensive arable farming and dairy and beef cattle and sheep farming. There is a flock of{milk {sheep}used for producing soft cheese and yoghurt. There is a{Plant Hire,}Land Drainage and Civil Engineering Firm employing 120 people, some of them local. There are two{garages,}one dealing in self-drive hire and general servicing of vehicles, the other dealing with commercial vehicle repairs. The two{public houses}and the shop employ some local people. Finally, some of the local people {commute}to work in the nearby towns of Wem, Ellesmere, Whitchurch, and Shrewsbury.
